description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in the Windows Mobile Broadband Driver identified as CVE-2024-43525:

1. Download the relevant update based on your system version and architecture.
2. Apply the update using the provided link.
3. Restart your system to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- The vulnerability stems from improper input validation and heap-based buffer overflow, and it can lead to remote code execution if exploited.
- Ensure that your system meets the required build number before applying the updates.

**Update Packages**:
- For further details, visit the update catalog links:
  - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
  - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system matches the indicated build numbers for Windows 10 or Windows 11.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
